## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                                              | Type     | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `el_id`     | `el_id`      | the id of component                                                                                      | `string` | `undefined` |
| `inputName` | `input-name` |                                                                                                          | `string` | `undefined` |
